wikimedia-copyrightwarning:
Taɣibunima din yɛn kpɛhi ŋɔ wuhiya, ni a saɣi n-ti [https://foundation.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Policy:Terms_of_Use Terms of Use], ka saɣi saɣiri shɛli din ka nyaaŋa labbu ni a ni  waɣisi a tohibu n-niŋ [https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/ CC BY-SA 4.0 License] and the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Text_of_the_GNU_Free_Documentation_License GFDL].
A saɣiya ni  hyperlink bee URL nyɛla yɛrida bini zaɣ'pali din be Creative Commons license ni.
wikimedia-globalblocking-ipblocked:
'''A IP address nyɛla din [[m:Special:MyLanguage/Global blocks|blocked on all wikis]].'''

Ŋun gbaali n-kpari n daa nyɛ  $1 ($2).
Daliri dinche ka kparibu maa kpari n-nyɛ ''$3''.

* Kparibu piligu: $4
* Kparibu naabu: $5
A sahaŋɔ IP address n-nyɛ $6.$3
Pahimi suɣulo ka zaŋ lahabali ŋan-do zuɣusaa ŋɔ n-nyɛ din kahigira yɛlilikam ŋɔ m-pahi a bohisi kam puuni.
Diyiniŋ ka a dihitabili ni a kparibu maa daa nyɛla sarigibu, a ni tooi nya lahabali din pahi ni sodoli shɛŋa din-be [[m:Special:MyLanguage/No open proxies|No open proxies]] andunia zalikpana ni.
Ka di yi naɣpa lala, diyi yɛn gbaai kpribu ŋɔ saawara dimi suɣulo [[m:Steward requests/Global|post a request for review on Meta-Wiki]].
